ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Need some opinions
ygData.msgSnippet: Wulfric has already answered, but I will chime in with my 2 cp worth, too. A lot of the older, seasoned players are re-starting new characters from scratch.
ygData.messageBody:
Wulfric has already answered, but I will chime in with my 2 cp worth, too.

A lot of the older, seasoned players are re-starting new characters from
scratch. They have done the level 50+ thing, started new characters and
twinked them to the hilt, and now, since that isn't much of a challenge,
they (myself included) are starting new characters from scratch, without
twinking. Most races and classes now have fairly simple "newbie armor"
quests where you can earn a complete set (8 pieces, if you do the bracers
twice) of not too shabby armor by level 10, including a magical weapon, and
it's fun, at least it is to me. I know a level 40 cleric that is still
wearing quite a bit of his newbie armor.

You will still see "lvl 7 Wiz LFG" being shouted in the newbie zones -- in
other words, it's still not difficult finding a group at lower levels.

A number of people that I know have left EQ for DAOC and other games, only
to come back, because those games were somehow "lacking" compared to EQ.

Froondor

----- Original Message -----
From: <odd_yager@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 10, 2003 4:40 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Need some opinions


> Hey everyone,
>
> I need some help on my next MPORPG purchase. I played EQ since Beta
> and quit about 2 and half years ago (college took priority heh) and
> now that I have secured a somewhat stable career, I'm planning to hit
> online RPGing again. Question is, being that EQ has been out for 5
> years, is it too late to come back and start anew? Meaning am I going
> to look ridiculous (prolly will regardless) being the only lvl 6 guy
> on the server in cloth and using fine steel? Or should I look for
> another MRORPG game? How is Camelot? Or Neverwinter Nights?
>
> Regards,
>
> Yager
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
